trans-unit.source: Subcontracting Production Order

As an alternative to opening multiple documents to complete a subcontracting process, use the Subcontracting Prod. Order page, where each step of external production including supply of components can be managed and controlled. Open the page from a Production Order by clicking Subcontracting on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: As an alternative to opening multiple documents to complete a subcontracting process, use the <span class="Bold">Subcontracting Prod.
Order page, where each step of external production including supply of components can be managed and controlled.
Open the page from a Production Order by clicking Subcontracting on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: : Accessing the Subcontracting function on the production order

seg-source.mrk: : Accessing the Subcontracting function on the production order

trans-unit.source: In the Subcontracting Prod. Order page, the Subcontracting Worksheet, Transfer Orders and Purchase Orders can be created and opened.

seg-source.mrk: Order page, the Subcontracting Worksheet, Transfer Orders and Purchase Orders can be created and opened.

trans-unit.source: : Subcontracting Prod. Order page

The fields on the General and Schedule FastTabs are the same as on the Production Order, with the exception of the Subcontr. Wksh. Exists check box on the General FastTab. This field indicates if a Subcontracting Worksheet for the production order has been created.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General and Schedule FastTabs are the same as on the Production Order, with the exception of the Subcontr.
Exists check box on the General FastTab.
This field indicates if a Subcontracting Worksheet for the production order has been created.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field
Description
Enclosure Components
Indicates if production order components are linked to the routing line with a Routing Link Code.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if production order components are linked to the routing line with a Routing Link Code.

trans-unit.source: Requisition Line Exists
Indicates if a Subcontracting Worksheet exists for the routing line.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if a Subcontracting Worksheet exists for the routing line.

trans-unit.source: Purchase Line
Indicates the number of the open purchase order for the completed item.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of the open purchase order for the completed item.

trans-unit.source: Purch. Rcpt. Line
Indicates the number of the posted purchase receipt.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of the posted purchase receipt.

trans-unit.source: Transfer Order
Indicates the number of the open transfer order.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of the open transfer order.

trans-unit.source: Posted Transfer Order
Indicates the number of the posted transfer order.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of the posted transfer order.

trans-unit.source: Encl. Drop Shipment

Indicates the number of the enclosure drop shipment purchase order or the posted enclosure drop shipment receipt (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor.htm#_Ref310440441" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of the enclosure drop shipment purchase order or the posted enclosure drop shipment receipt (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor.htm#_Ref310440441" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Operation No.
Automatically generated in the Prod. Order Routing.
No.
Work Center assigned in the Prod. Order Routing

seg-source.mrk: Work Center assigned in the Prod.

trans-unit.source: Routing Link Code
Routing Link assigned in the Prod. Order Routing.

seg-source.mrk: Routing Link assigned in the Prod.

trans-unit.source: Description
Description of the work center.
Subcontractor No.
Subcontractor assigned to the work center.

seg-source.mrk: Subcontractor assigned to the work center.

trans-unit.source: The subcontracting-related functions on the ribbon are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The subcontracting-related functions on the ribbon are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Functions
Description
Create Subcontracting Worksheet
Creates and opens a Subcontracting Worksheet with Name = {Production Order No.} for the routing lines.

seg-source.mrk: Creates and opens a Subcontracting Worksheet with Name = {Production Order No.} for the routing lines.

trans-unit.source: Running this function selects the Subcontr. Wksh. Exists check box on the General FastTab and sets the Requisition Line Exists field to Yes on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab in the Subcontracting Prod. Order page.

seg-source.mrk: Running this function selects the <span class="Bold">Subcontr.
Exists check box on the General FastTab and sets the Requisition Line Exists field to Yes on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab in the Subcontracting Prod.

trans-unit.source: Open Subcontracting Worksheet
Opens the Subcontracting Worksheet for the routing lines.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Subcontracting Worksheet for the routing lines.

trans-unit.source: Create Purchase Order

Runs the “Carry Out Action Message” function on the Subcontracting Worksheet and creates a Purchase Order for the completed item and a Transfer Order for the enclosed components. If a drop shipment is set for an enclosure component, a purchase order for that will be created as well (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor.htm#_Ref310440453" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Runs the “Carry Out Action Message” function on the Subcontracting Worksheet and creates a Purchase Order for the completed item and a Transfer Order for the enclosed components.

If a drop shipment is set for an enclosure component, a purchase order for that will be created as well (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor.htm#_Ref310440453" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Running this function deletes the Subcontracting Worksheet line so the Requisition Line Exists field is set to No in the Subcontracting Prod. Order page.

seg-source.mrk: Running this function deletes the Subcontracting Worksheet line so the Requisition Line Exists field is set to No in the Subcontracting Prod.

trans-unit.source: Note
The Subcontracting Worksheet remains open until the Production Order is finished.

seg-source.mrk: The Subcontracting Worksheet remains open until the Production Order is finished.

trans-unit.source: The menu items on the Navigate tab are the same as on the Production Order.

seg-source.mrk: The menu items on the Navigate tab are the same as on the Production Order.

trans-unit.source: The menu items on the Line menu from the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The menu items on the Line menu from the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Functions
Description
Open Purchase Order
Opens the Purchase Lines page for the completed item purchase order; can also be opened from the Purchase Line field on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Purchase Lines page for the completed item purchase order; can also be opened from the Purchase Line field on the line.

trans-unit.source: Open Posted Purch. Order
Opens the Posted Purchase Receipt Lines page for the completed item purchase order; can also be opened from the Purch. Rcpt. Line field on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Posted Purchase Receipt Lines page for the completed item purchase order; can also be opened from the Purch.

trans-unit.source: Open Transfer Order
Opens the Transfer Order page; can also be opened from the Transfer Order field on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Transfer Order page; can also be opened from the Transfer Order field on the line.

trans-unit.source: Open Posted Transfer Order
Opens the Posted Transfer Receipt page; can also be opened from the Posted Transfer Order field on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Posted Transfer Receipt page; can also be opened from the Posted Transfer Order field on the line.

trans-unit.source: Open Encl. Drop Shipment

Opens the Purchase Lines page (if enclosure drop shipment purchase order is open) or Posted Purchase Receipt Lines page (if enclosure drop shipment purchase order is posted); either page can also be opened from the Encl. Drop Shipment field on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Purchase Lines page (if enclosure drop shipment purchase order is open) or Posted Purchase Receipt Lines page (if enclosure drop shipment purchase order is posted); either page can also be opened from the Encl.
Drop Shipment field on the line.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor.htm#_Ref310440460" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor.htm#_Ref310440460" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Drop Shipment to the Subcontractor” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Components
Opens the Prod. Order Components page.

As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref310441083" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 3</MadCap:xref>, the “Create Subcontracting Worksheet” function has been run.

seg-source.mrk: As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref310441083" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 3</MadCap:xref>, the “Create Subcontracting Worksheet” function has been run.

trans-unit.source: : Subcontracting Worksheet created from Subcontracting Prod. Order page

seg-source.mrk: : Subcontracting Worksheet created from Subcontracting Prod.

trans-unit.source: When the “Create Purchase Order” function is run from the Subcontracting Prod. Order page, the Subcontracting Worksheet is deleted, the related fields are updated, a Transfer Order is created and a Purchase Order is created.

seg-source.mrk: When the “Create Purchase Order” function is run from the <span class="Bold">Subcontracting Prod.
Order page, the Subcontracting Worksheet is deleted, the related fields are updated, a Transfer Order is created and a Purchase Order is created.

trans-unit.source: Note
The “Carry Out Action Message” function does not need to be run manually on the Subcontracting Worksheet; it is run with the “Create Purchase Order” function.

seg-source.mrk: The “Carry Out Action Message” function does not need to be run manually on the Subcontracting Worksheet; it is run with the “Create Purchase Order” function.

trans-unit.source: : Results of running the Create Purchase Order function

seg-source.mrk: : Results of running the Create Purchase Order function

trans-unit.source: Open the Transfer Order from the Transfer Order field on the line or from the Line menu on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab. After the Transfer Order is posted, the Subcontracting Production Order line is updated with the posted document number.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Transfer Order from the Transfer Order field on the line or from the Line menu on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab.
After the Transfer Order is posted, the Subcontracting Production Order line is updated with the posted document number.

trans-unit.source: : Results of posting the Transfer Order

seg-source.mrk: : Results of posting the Transfer Order

trans-unit.source: Open the Purchase Order from the Purchase Line field on the line or from the Line menu on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab. After the Purchase Order is posted, the Subcontracting Production Order line is updated with the posted document number.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Purchase Order from the Purchase Line field on the line or from the Line menu on the Subcontracting Routing Lines FastTab.
After the Purchase Order is posted, the Subcontracting Production Order line is updated with the posted document number.

trans-unit.source: : Results of posting the Purchase Order

seg-source.mrk: : Results of posting the Purchase Order
